attributes.action: Do not leave the EU without a deal
attributes.additional_details:
The quote from Vote Leave is taken from
http://www.voteleavetakecontrol.org/briefing_newdeal.html
attributes.background: In the 2016 referendum, Vote Leave promised "a new UK-EU Treaty based on free trade and friendly cooperation. There is a European free trade zone from Iceland to the Russian border and we will be part of it". Leaving without a deal would break this commitment to Leavers and alienate Remainers.
